crisis.name: Bath Salts
crisis.description: A drug epidemic where users snort bath salts in order to get a high.
crisis.humanImpact: According to a CDC report of bath salt abusers in Michigan, users not only experience psychological side effects -- there were physical ones too. In fact, 91 percent of users had neurological damage, while 77 percent experienced cardiovascular damage and 49 percent had psychological difficulties associated with the drug. Those difficulties could be severe: 37 percent of the people who suffered mental health problems reported attempting suicide or having suicidal thoughts, related to bath salts.
crisis.wayToHelp: Raise awareness through word of mouth

crisis.name: North Korea and Nuclear Weapons
crisis.description: North Korea's nuclear program is of concern for the rest of the world because of their unstable government
crisis.humanImpact: It is unknown if there are any deaths caused by the North Korean nuclear program
crisis.economicImpact: Due to the secrecy of the North Korean government it is unknown what the cost of North Korea's nuclear program is.
crisis.resourceNeeded: Increased international pressure on North Korea to cut their nuclear weapons program
crisis.wayToHelp: Join the Free North Korea Coalition and raise awareness

crisis.name: Tibetan Occupation
crisis.description: China's contraversal occupation of Tibet has resulted in many suicides and what some have claimed cultural genocide
crisis.humanImpact: Mass suicides, Cultural Genocide, Death toll estimated to be 1,200,000.
crisis.economicImpact: China's control has created an economic boom, with Tibet's GDP being 65 times what it was before China's control
crisis.wayToHelp: Join an awareness organization, donate to the various organizations aiming to free tibet, join a boycott of goods made in China
